text: The 2007 NFL season was the 88th regular season of the National Football League. The season ended with New York Giants defeating the New England Patriots in Super Bowl XLII at University of Phoenix Stadium in Glendale, Arizona on February 3, 2008. __TOC__ ==Regular season standings== ===Division=== ==Postseason== ===Bracket=== ==Other websites== *Football Outsiders 2007 DVOA Ratings
title: 2007 NFL season
